name: Gene-o-cide CSE
description:
Move with WASD, shoot and aim with mouse (look with right mouse button).

This version is to be presented as one of the final requirements for CSE subject in March 2019.

The game features sound effects and background music borrowed from a Korean MMO game called "BOUT"

Consists of 3 short missions, 3 enemy variations, and 2 projectile types.

There are no background included in this release yet.
